name: rough-skin

effect.scarlet-violet: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.
effect.the-teal-mask: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Inflicts only 1/16 of the attacker's maximum HP in damage.

short_effect: Damages attacking Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP on contact.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: The Pokémon's rough skin damages attackers that make direct contact with it.
